lead_paragraph: The company reported quarterly sales of 600,000 phones, a decline of 100,000 from the previous period. It did not say how many were its Android model.

headline.print_headline: With a Focus on Android, BlackBerry Falls Short
headline.main: BlackBerry Falls Short in Attempt at Android-Based Revival

snippet: The company reported quarterly sales of 600,000 phones, a decline of 100,000 from the previous period. It did not say how many were its Android model.
abstract: BlackBerry says it sold 600,000 smartphones using Google's Android operating system in quarter ending Feb 29, decline of 100,000 phones from previous quarter.
